Posts.Content:
Going through similar situation right now as all of you ladies. Waiting is the
worst for sure. I am semi-confident it will not be a malignancy however
my mom passed from a rare form of breast cancer (not detectable through
mammography which is terrifying). They found hers on accident when they 
thought she tore a muscle in her shoulder pec area while walking their dog. 
With a history of breast cancer and being Jewish it makes it difficult to be positive 
at times.
Posts.Title: percentage of malignancy in clustered microcalcifications in one breast only
